name: Project Bicycle - W.I.P.
description:
Just a quick prototype in my signature style, get 2 unity assets, mixing them up and doing small tweaks! But i do see a future here... (now i ve ony spend like 2 h, really)

WARNING: game has problem running in WEBGL form on mobile right now, will fix

The controls can be vastly optimized, and deepened, so i do believe in the hyper casual - hyper core maret potential (simple yet deep controls). Lots of possibilities for a deeper meta as well (bicycle upgrades, lots of different tracks et al= Performance can also be vastly optimized, now i am running the "everything in"demo scene of the environment asset. And finally, i havent seen this type of mobile game a lot, i think it has a hook
